titleStmt.title: A heavenly conference between Christ and Mary after His resurrection. Wherein the intimate familiarity, and near relation between Christ and a believer is discovered.
titleStmt.author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Rothwel, and are to be sold at the Fountain and Bear in Cheap-side,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
